summary:
The Boeing 747 is a large passenger airplane. It was made by Boeing in the United States from 1968 to 2023. Pan Am, an airline, wanted a bigger plane than the 707, and Joe Sutter designed the 747. It was first flown in 1969 and entered service in 1970.

The 747 has four engines and a wide body. It can carry many passengers and travel long distances. Over time, newer versions were made with improvements. The last one was delivered in 2023, and it's used by many airlines, especially for cargo.
title: Boeing 747
